description.value:
Aarakocra*

Speed. Your base walking speed is 25 feet.

Talons. Your feet are talons which count as natural weapons. They use your Strength or Dexterity and deal 1d4 + your modifier slashing damage on a hit. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.AOFYUHXWN9V02I6E]{Talons}

Flight. While you are not wearing medium or heavy armor, you have a flying speed of 40 feet. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.BQBKSB8VD7M2TK9N]{Flight}

Limited Stamina. You can only manage to fly in short bursts and will fall if you end your turn in the air and nothing else is holding you aloft. Starting at 5th level you no longer suffer this restriction. @Compendium[5e-stat-decoupled.abilities.YW0YYLB9DO9ZN9KK]{Limited Stamina}
